bibliographic-data.invention-title: ONLINE DISCUSSION ABILITY AUTHENTICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PERFORMING METHOD

abstract.p: Disclosed is a discussion solution providing system. The discussion solution providing system opens a discussion room with a particular topic, and transmits image information of each discussion participant participating in the opened discussion room to terminals of each discussion participant, so that the transmitted image information may be displayed on discussion UIs corresponding to each discussion participant. The discussion solution providing system progresses discussion in a tournament type, thereby inspiring the participants to have competitive spirits and increasing the educational effect.

applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Online discussion ability authentication method and system for performing method

abstract.p: Disclosed is a discussion solution providing system. The discussion solution providing system opens a discussion room with a particular topic, and transmits image information of each discussion participant participating in the opened discussion room to terminals of each discussion participant, so that the transmitted image information may be displayed on discussion UIs corresponding to each discussion participant. The discussion solution providing system progresses discussion in a tournament type, thereby inspiring the participants to have competitive spirits and increasing the educational effect.

applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP [KR]
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

abstract.p: PURPOSE: A discussion solution providing system for systematically educating a speech and debating ability through the automated solution is provided to perform the training and education of communication through the solution for training. CONSTITUTION: A discussion server(100) installs predetermined client applications to discussion participant terminals(10-40). The client applications are connected with the discussion server through wire/wireless network. The client applications embody the discussion solution. The discussion server is connected to a terminal(50).

applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP [KR]
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR CERTIFYING ON-LINE DEBATE ABILITY AND SYSTEM USING THE SAME

abstract.p: PURPOSE: An online discussion ability authentication method and a system performing the method according to a discussion type are provided to improve the discussion ability of the participants by freely selecting the participants. CONSTITUTION: A server transmits a plurality of discussion types to a terminal of a first user(S10). The server receives one discussion type selected by the first user(S20). The server selects one user as a discussion participant(S30). The server transmits a discussion theme to the terminal of the other user. The server plants trees the discussion videos received through terminals(S60).

applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP [KR]
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: ONLINE DISCUSSION ABILITY AUTHENTICATION METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PERFORMING METHOD
PROCÉDÉ D'AUTHENTIFICATION DE CAPACITÉ DE DISCUSSION EN LIGNE ET SYSTÈME DE MISE EN OEUVRE DUDIT PROCÉDÉ

abstract.p: Disclosed is a discussion solution providing system. The discussion solution providing system opens a discussion room with a particular topic, and transmits image information of each discussion participant participating in the opened discussion room to terminals of each discussion participant, so that the transmitted image information may be displayed on discussion UIs corresponding to each discussion participant. The discussion solution providing system progresses discussion in a tournament type, thereby inspiring the participants to have competitive spirits and increasing the educational effect.

L'invention concerne un système de fourniture de solution de discussion. Le système de fourniture de solution de discussion ouvre un forum de discussion avec un sujet particulier, et transmet les données d'images de chaque participant de la discussion, qui participe au forum de discussion ouvert, aux terminaux de chaque participant de la discussion, de façon à pouvoir afficher les données d'images transmises sur les UI de discussion correspondant à chaque participant de la discussion. Le système de fourniture de solution de discussion fait progresser la discussion dans un type de tournoi, ce qui permet d'inciter les participants à avoir l'esprit compétitif et d'augmenter l'effet éducatif.

UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY,
